name: Mekk-Knight Yellow Star
effectText: If 2 or more cards are in the same column, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in that column. You can only Special Summon "Mekk-Knight Yellow Star" once per turn this way. You can banish 1 "Mekk-Knight" monster from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap in this card's column; destroy it.
